content: for 2025 crochet guild of america the task is to create flying discs to donate to ronald mcdonald house i came up with this design to incorporate i-cord into the edge rather than have a folded edge my disc with i-cord encasement weighs 2 5oz as a finished item **materials ** worsted weight #4 3 strands held together i-cord **tools ** 6 5mm hook i-cord machine to make i-cord or make it via crochet or knitting * *i can rec the tulip i-cord machine working with worsted weight yarn what i used in this **you may need a little extra weight to add to the exit feed of i-cord ** for my i-cord machine i use the tulip weight and the cheap purple i-cord machines weight to put extra gauge on the yarn this works perfectly for me
